DESCRIPTION: Action Sequence number must be greater than zero

TEXT: actions_sub_type != 'suggestion' or resolved in ('NOT','UND') or res_action_id is not null
DESCRIPTION: Resolved Suggestions must have a Resolved Action ID

TEXT: resolved not in ('NOT','UND') or res_action_id is null
DESCRIPTION: Unresolved Actions cannot have a Resolved Action ID
Number of Last Actions to Display must be greater than or equal to zero
Number of Total Cards for a Player must be greater than or equal to zero
